Class GAGen

java.lang.Object
org.example.galaxy_trucker.Model.GAGen
All Implemented Interfaces:
Serializable
public class GAGen extends Object implements Serializable
GAGen class is responsible for loading and managing decks of tiles and cards used in the application. It provides functionality to convert the decks into sets and access the original lists. This class makes use of the Jackson ObjectMapper to load JSON data into Java objects. The decks data is expected to be stored in external JSON files.
See Also:
  • Serialized Form

    Constructors
    Constructor

    GAGen()
    Constructs a new instance of the GAGen class and initializes the tiles and cards decks by loading data from external JSON files.

  • Constructor Details

    • GAGen

      public GAGen() throws IOException
      Constructs a new instance of the GAGen class and initializes the tiles and cards decks by loading data from external JSON files.
      Throws:
      IOException - if an error occurs while loading the decks from the JSON files.

  • Method Details

    • TileListToSet

      public Set<Tile> TileListToSet()
      Converts the list of tiles (`tilesDeck`) into a set. This method ensures that duplicate tiles, if any, are removed when generating the set from the list.
      Returns:
      a Set containing the unique elements of `tilesDeck`.

    • CardListToSet

      public Set<Card> CardListToSet()
      Converts the list of cards (`cardsDeck`) into a set to eliminate duplicates and return a unique collection of cards.
      Returns:
      a set of unique Card objects created from the `cardsDeck` list.

    • getTilesDeck

      public ArrayList<Tile> getTilesDeck()
      Retrieves the current list of tiles in the tiles deck.
      Returns:
      an ArrayList of Tile objects representing the tiles deck.

    • getCardsDeck

      public ArrayList<Card> getCardsDeck()
      Retrieves the list of cards in the deck.
      Returns:
      An ArrayList containing Card objects representing the deck of cards.
